attributes.action: Deport non-british citizens who have broken the law in this country after their sentence has been served.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People of other nationalities, who have been convicted of a serious crime, should be deported after serving their sentences. This should be so even if their human rights are affected. They have forfeit their right to our hospitality.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
